# GitHub Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview

`picross-image-processor` is a TypeScript library that converts images into picross (nonogram) board representations. It analyzes image contours and color changes to create meaningful puzzle patterns.

### Key Features

- Automatic bounding box detection
- Contour detection for image edges
- Color change detection for internal details
- Configurable board sizes and sensitivity
- Support for images with transparency
- Works in both browser and Node.js environments
- Canvas-based image processing

### Build and Publish

```bash
npm install      # Install dependencies
npm run build    # Compile TypeScript
npm publish      # Publish to npm registry
```
